description: Check availability of different domains via Vercel's Domain Search

capabilities.name: SearchDomains
capabilities.description: Takes in an array of domain names. Give the user a link to purchase the domain which can be hyperlinked as 'Purchased on Vercel' unless otherwise specified.

capabilities.name: CheckTldsSupported
capabilities.description: Checks if the provided TLDs are supported on Vercel Domains and returns their base prices.

capabilities.name: GetSupportedTlds
capabilities.description: Returns all TLDs supported on Vercel Domains along with their base prices. Warning, this returns a large list of 500+ TLDs and CheckTldsSupported may be a better option.
